subject: Re: Order #SSN3549 confirmed
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,
I am so sorry, but after ordering these pedals, I realised that the elastomers on the Pro Model are a bit tricky to replace.
Would it be possible for me to change my order? Instead of the Pro Model I ordered, I would like to order the Plus X P2-H2 in black, if possible.
Kind regards,Thomas Pieber


    Am Sonntag, 16. November 2025 um 17:29:56 MEZ hat SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> Folgendes geschrieben:

conversations.body_text:
Good day, 
 I am still waiting for a response, and I am unable to log in to the ticket portal. 
 Kind regards, 
 Thomas Von meinem iPhone gesendet Am 16.11.2025 um 18:40 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Thomas Pieber We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours). To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6220?follow=email Thank you for your patience. View ticket If the button doesn't work, copy-paste this URL in your browser's address bar: https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6220?follow=email Regards, simsonn Support Team 





 
 




6220:4206036
Hi Thomas Pieber,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will arrange a replacement for you. Please don't worry.

Good afternoon,This concerns order #SSN3549.The order was placed on November 16, and one of the two items has not yet been shipped. Unfortunately, I have not received any notification from you as to why it has not been shipped.Please clarify this matter.
Best regards, Thomas PIeber

    Am Mittwoch, 19. November 2025 um 13:01:49 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com
Hi Thomas Pieber,     Your order has been shipped, but the warehouse did not process it promptly. We sincerely apologize for the delay and will follow up on this matter.

Hello,

thank you, I received the Plus X P2-H2 pedals today.Since I selected and paid for the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 pedals when I placed my order, I would like to ask you to refund the price difference to me.Please let me know. 

Thank you Best regards,Thomas Pieber

    Am Freitag, 28. November 2025 um 14:41:38 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com

I am still waiting for the difference to be refunded.
Please get back to me!

    Am Mittwoch, 3. Dezember 2025 um 15:34:58 MEZ hat Thomas Pieber <thomas.pieber@aol.com> Folgendes geschrieben:   

  Hello,

thank you, I received the Plus X P2-H2 pedals today.Since I selected and paid for the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 pedals when I placed my order, I would like to ask you to refund the price difference to me.Please let me know. 

Thank you Best regards,Thomas Pieber

    Am Freitag, 28. November 2025 um 14:41:38 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com

I'll describe the problem to you one more time!!!I ordered and paid for the Simsonn ProX pedals from you. I then wrote to you to ask if it would be possible to change the order to Simsonn Plus X pedals. You took care of this and I received the Simsonn Plus X pedals.However, I am still waiting for the $66 compensation payment!!!
I will give you one more week until December 23, 2025. If I have not received my money by then, I will contact my lawyer.
Sincerely,Thomas Pieber



    Am Donnerstag, 11. Dezember 2025 um 17:04:40 MEZ hat Thomas Pieber <thomas.pieber@aol.com> Folgendes geschrieben:   

  I am still waiting for the difference to be refunded.
Please get back to me!

    Am Mittwoch, 3. Dezember 2025 um 15:34:58 MEZ hat Thomas Pieber <thomas.pieber@aol.com> Folgendes geschrieben:   

  Hello,

thank you, I received the Plus X P2-H2 pedals today.Since I selected and paid for the Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 pedals when I placed my order, I would like to ask you to refund the price difference to me.Please let me know. 

Thank you Best regards,Thomas Pieber

    Am Freitag, 28. November 2025 um 14:41:38 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com

Hi Thomas Pieber,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I noticed you used the $45 discount for orders over $199. After adjusting your products, the total payment amount no longer meets the $199 threshold required for this discount. The price difference between the two products is $71. Since we cannot apply the $45 discount to your order, we will issue you a $40 refund. Is that acceptable?

Good afternoon,
Let's say $50 and meet halfway. I would be fine with that.


    Am Montag, 22. Dezember 2025 um 04:32:58 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com

I wait for a answer.



    Am Montag, 22. Dezember 2025 um 09:04:03 MEZ hat Thomas Pieber <thomas.pieber@aol.com> Folgendes geschrieben:   

  Good afternoon,
Let's say $50 and meet halfway. I would be fine with that.


    Am Montag, 22. Dezember 2025 um 04:32:58 MEZ hat service@simsonn.com
